author: m.kalinin
content: `SHARD_BLOCK_OFFSETS` starts from `1` which results in attester is not being able to crosslink a shard block proposed in _current_ slot. Is this by design?

author: djrtwo
content: yes, beacon blocks are created at the start of a slot, shard blocks are created partway through a slot. That shard block can then optimally be crosslinked at the start of the next slot

author: djrtwo
content: beacon block -> shard block (refs beacon) -> attestations (including vote for shard block) - > | NEW SLOT | -> beacon block (include attestations from prev slot)

author: djrtwo
content: so an attester assigned to slot `S` _votes_  on a shard block from slot `S`. This can be included in the beacon block at slot `S + 1`
